channel.title: Motivation and Data Gathering on With Subtle Notes of Dry Summer Rain
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation and Data Gathering on With Subtle Notes of Dry Summer Rain

item.title: A Brief Introduction
item.description: A quick dive into the discipline of Social Network Analysis. A network consists of nodes and connections are made through edges where each may have a weight. To each attribute there may also be assigned some attribute. In our case, the network consists of users where each edge signifies an interaction (these are the ones that change between our questions) and are assigned various attributes such as average, price and rating of reviewed wines.

item.title: Data Preprocessing and Statistics
item.description:
All the data gathered needs to be processed in order to be useful. Take user 38077555’s review:

It contains emojies that hold little informative value out of context. The reviews are filtered by the provided language tag from Vivino for only reviews they classify as being in English.

item.title: What does good wine taste like?
What does the different wine types taste like?
What does wine taste like?
item.description: Examining the general taste of wine we create a network where interactions are simply defined by if users have reviewed the same wine. It looks like this.
